resources.string:
Objective: find as much rhyme words as possible within the specified time. Only perfect rhymes count. Each word will give you a specific amount of points. Better rhyme words will give more points. 
 
 FYI, the time frames are: 
 Easy: 70 sec 
 Medium: 60 sec 
 Hard: 50 sec 
 Insane: 40 sec 
 Random: 60 sec 
 
 Also, the words will keep getting harder. Do you got what it takes to become the next rhyme master? Good luck!
